meanings.definition: The quality or state of being trusting or having trust in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her trustfulnesses in her best friend never wavered.
meanings.sent2: His trustfulnesses in the new employee were well-placed.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's trustfulnesses in the mailman led to many treats.
meanings.sent4: The garden's trustfulnesses in the sun brought forth beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The child's trustfulnesses in the magic of bedtime stories was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The act of placing confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The team's trustfulnesses in their captain was evident in their performance.
meanings.sent2: She showed her trustfulnesses in the safety measures by following them diligently.
meanings.sent3: The cat's trustfulnesses in the laser pointer always led to amusing chases.
meanings.sent4: The tree's trustfulnesses in its roots kept it standing tall through the storm.
meanings.sent5: His trustfulnesses in the power of positive thinking transformed his life.
